-h|--help: --- Prints this help message and quits
--help-all: --- Prints help messages of all sub-commands and quits
-v|--version: --- Prints the program's version and quits
-a|--answers-file: --- Update using this path (relative to `destination_path`) to find the answers file
-d|--data: --- Make VARIABLE available as VALUE when rendering the template; may be given multiple times
-g|--prereleases: --- Use prereleases to compare template VCS tags.
-l|--defaults: --- Use default answers to questions, which might be null if not specified.
-n|--pretend: --- Run but do not make any changes
-s|--skip: --- Skip specified files if they exist already; may be given multiple times
-w|--overwrite: --- Overwrite files that already exist, without asking.
-x|--exclude: --- A name or shell-style pattern matching files or folders that must not be copied; may be given multiple times

copy.#desc: Copy from a template source to a destination.

update.#desc: Update a copy from its original template.
